benchmark_details.name: Bongard-OpenWorld
benchmark_details.overview: Bongard-OpenWorld is a new benchmark for evaluating real-world few-shot reasoning for machine vision, aiming to facilitate the development of human-like visual intelligence through complex visual concepts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To develop and evaluate few-shot learning algorithms for reasoning about open vocabulary visual concepts in real-world images.

data.source: Collected from Conceptual Captions (CC-3M) and crowd-sourced challenging concepts.
data.annotation: Manually verified and structured visual concepts.

methodology.calculation: Compared model predictions against ground truth visual concepts.
methodology.interpretation: Accuracy indicates the proportion of correctly classified query images.
methodology.baseline_results: Best performer achieved 64% accuracy versus 91% human accuracy.
